data.message: Facebook, i have reported this notifications issue few days ago, and still has not been resolved. and i even messaged you and no response. When i come back to my laptop and check my notifications on my globe, that notification is not there. I have to refresh FB to see that notification. please fix it. it's a good thing i have social fixer to fix FB's own stupidity in features, even when FB creates a loop through it.

replies.message: Hi Adria! Please report this to us by following these steps in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2iMBULP. Thanks! -Caitlin
i reported it just few days ago. i just have to keep reporting it?
And i can't upload albums to FB.
Thank you for reaching out, Adria. If you have reported this issue to our team, hang tight while we take the time to review the situation. We appreciate your patience. -Ashley
i have reported the notification issue twice and the posting album issue once. Thanks, FB.
